mapper.select: SELECT d.id AS 'diagnosis_id', d.name AS 'diagnosis_name', d.number_of_choice AS 'diagnosis_number_of_choice', q.id AS 'question_id', q.diagnosis_id AS 'question_diagnosis_id', q.content AS 'question_content', q.reverse AS 'question_reverse', qb.id AS 'question_base_line_id', qb.diagnosis_id AS 'question_base_line_diagnosis_id', qb.content AS 'question_base_line_content', qb.score AS 'question_base_line_score' FROM diagnosis d LEFT OUTER JOIN question q ON q.diagnosis_id = d.id LEFT OUTER JOIN question_base_line qb ON qb.diagnosis_id = d.id WHERE d.id = #{diagnosisId}
